be.thepieterdc.k8055

Class Counter

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.thepieterdc.k8055.Counter

  • public class Counter
extends java.lang.Object
    The K8055 has 2 internal counters that can be accessed using this class.
    Author:
    Pieter De Clercq
